tasks.label: dev: Start Development Server
tasks.command: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 20 && npm run dev

tasks.label: db: Run Migrations
tasks.command: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 20 && npm run db:migrate

tasks.label: db: Open Studio
tasks.command: export NVM_DIR="$HOME/.nvm" && [ -s "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" ] && . "$NVM_DIR/nvm.sh" && nvm use 20 && npm run db:studio
